==Trivia==
* The [[Furnishing]] "[[Hot Spring Retreat: Marketing Strategy]]" is designed to resemble Xochicuicatl Records.

===Etymology===
* Xochicuicatl is Nahuatl for "flower song," deriving from ''{{wt|xochitl}}'' "flower" and ''{{wt|cuicatl}}'' "song."
